con:part.con:content: The operation for canceling a successful topup. Service-Error ActionCode ActionCodeId WRONG_DATA2aGENERAL_ERROR RECHARGE_NOT_POSSIBLE2aGENERAL_ERROR ALREADY_CANCELLED2eGENERAL_ERROR UNKNOWN_SUBSCRIBER1aUNKNOWN_SUBSCRIBER ]]> The operation for topup a client account. Service-Error ActionCode ActionCodeId WRONG_DATA2aGENERAL_ERROR RECHARGE_NOT_POSSIBLE2aGENERAL_ERROR IN_PROGRESSnullnull UNKNOWN_SUBSCRIBER1aUNKNOWN_SUBSCRIBER ]]> The operation for health check. The operation for request a topup. Service-Error ActionCode ActionCodeId WRONG_DATA2aGENERAL_ERROR UNKNOWN_TOPUP3cUNKNOWN_TOPUP IN_PROGRESSnullnull ]]>

<xsd:schema attributeFormDefault="unqualified" elementFormDefault="unqualified" targetNamespace="http://directrecharge.o2.com/iso8583topupservice/v1/" xmlns:xsd="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema" xmlns:iso="http://directrecharge.o2.com/ws/iso8583/v1/" xmlns:base="http://directrecharge.o2.com/ws/base/v1/" xmlns="http://directrecharge.o2.com/iso8583topupservice/v1/"> <xsd:import namespace="http://directrecharge.o2.com/ws/base/v1/" schemaLocation="http://mucsgdp08.sg.de.pri.o2.com:8180/drc/ws/PlainIso8583TopupService_v1?xsd=../common/Base_v1.xsd"/> <xsd:import namespace="http://directrecharge.o2.com/ws/iso8583/v1/" schemaLocation="http://mucsgdp08.sg.de.pri.o2.com:8180/drc/ws/PlainIso8583TopupService_v1?xsd=../common/Iso8583_v1.xsd"/> <xsd:simpleType name="isoGwServerId"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>ID of ISO-GW-Server.</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> <xsd:restriction base="xsd:string"> <xsd:minLength value="1"/> <xsd:maxLength value="50"/> </xsd:restriction> </xsd:simpleType> <xsd:simpleType name="actionCode"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>result code for the iso8583 message.</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> <xsd:restriction base="xsd:string"> <xsd:minLength value="2"/> <xsd:maxLength value="2"/> </xsd:restriction> </xsd:simpleType> <xsd:simpleType name="iso8583Protocol"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Type of the iso8583 protocol</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> <xsd:restriction base="xsd:string"> <xsd:enumeration value="ATM"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>ATM</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:enumeration> <xsd:enumeration value="POS"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>POS-Terminal</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:enumeration> </xsd:restriction> </xsd:simpleType> <xsd:element name="transactionInProgressFault" type="transactionInProgressFault"/> <xsd:complexType name="transactionInProgressFault"> <xsd:sequence></xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> <xsd:element name="transactionFault" type="transactionFault"/> <xsd:complexType name="transactionFault"> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element name="transactionError" type="transactionErrorEnum"/> <xsd:element minOccurs="0" name="correlationId" type="xsd:string"/> <xsd:element minOccurs="0" name="tenantId" type="xsd:int"/> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> <xsd:simpleType name="transactionErrorEnum"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Possible iso8583 service errors</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> <xsd:restriction base="xsd:string"> <xsd:enumeration value="UNKNOWN_SUBSCRIBER"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>The msisdn is not known</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:enumeration> <xsd:enumeration value="UNKNOWN_TOPUP"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>The topup is not known</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:enumeration> <xsd:enumeration value="DUPLICATED_REQUEST"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>A duplicated request found or the topup is already cancelled</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:enumeration> <xsd:enumeration value="GENERAL_ERROR"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>A unknown error</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:enumeration> </xsd:restriction> </xsd:simpleType> <xsd:complexType name="transactionData"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Container with the the transaction data.</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element name="amount" type="xsd:long"/> <xsd:element name="msisdn" type="base:msisdn"/> <xsd:element name="paymentDate" type="xsd:dateTime"/> <xsd:element name="cardType" type="iso:cardType"/> <xsd:element name="partnerId" type="iso:partnerId"/> <xsd:element minOccurs="0" name="processingCode" type="xsd:string"/> <xsd:element minOccurs="0" name="serverId" type="iso:serverId"/> <xsd:element name="terminalId" type="iso:terminalId"/> <xsd:element name="transactionId" type="iso:transactionId"/> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> <xsd:complexType name="transactionRequestData"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Container with the the transaction request.</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element name="transactionData" type="transactionData"/> <xsd:element name="isoGwServerId" type="isoGwServerId"/> <xsd:element name="iso8583Protocol" type="iso8583Protocol"/> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> <xsd:complexType name="transactionResultData"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Element defines the result of the request.</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element name="duplicate" type="xsd:boolean"/> <xsd:element name="failed" type="xsd:boolean"/> <xsd:element minOccurs="0" name="correlationId" type="base:correlationId"/> <xsd:element minOccurs="0" name="tenantId" type="base:tenantId"/> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> <!--Cancellation types--> <xsd:element name="cancel" type="Cancel"/> <xsd:complexType name="Cancel"> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element name="transactionRequestData" type="transactionRequestData"/> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> <xsd:element name="cancelResponse" type="cancelResponse"/> <xsd:complexType name="cancelResponse"> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element name="transactionResultData" type="transactionResultData"/> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> <!--Topup types--> <xsd:element name="topup" type="Topup"/> <xsd:complexType name="Topup"> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element name="transactionRequestData" type="transactionRequestData"/> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> <xsd:element name="topupResponse" type="TopupResponse"/> <xsd:complexType name="TopupResponse"> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element name="transactionResultData" type="transactionResultData"/> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> <!--healthCheck--> <xsd:element name="healthCheck" type="HealthCheck"/> <xsd:complexType name="HealthCheck"></xsd:complexType> <xsd:element name="healthCheckResponse" type="HealthCheckResponse"/> <xsd:complexType name="HealthCheckResponse"></xsd:complexType> <!--getRelatedTopup--> <xsd:element name="getRelatedTopup" type="GetRelatedTopup"/> <xsd:complexType name="GetRelatedTopup"> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element name="transactionData" type="transactionData"/> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> <xsd:element name="getRelatedTopupResponse" type="GetRelatedTopupResponse"/> <xsd:complexType name="GetRelatedTopupResponse"> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element name="transactionResultData" type="transactionResultData"/> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> </xsd:schema>

<xs:schema attributeFormDefault="unqualified" elementFormDefault="unqualified" targetNamespace="http://directrecharge.o2.com/ws/base/v1/" xmlns:xs="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema" xmlns:tns="http://directrecharge.o2.com/ws/base/v1/"> <xs:simpleType name="correlationId"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>ID for financial tracking. Example: 5512345678</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> <xs:restriction base="xs:string"> <xs:pattern value="\d{9,15}"/> </xs:restriction> </xs:simpleType> <xs:simpleType name="application"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>Application name of the client-system</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> <xs:restriction base="xs:string"> <xs:pattern value="\w*"/> <!--no special character like '%', '$', or '-' but '_' is valid--> </xs:restriction> </xs:simpleType> <xs:simpleType name="serviceProviderId"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>Service provider ID as SAS-Code.</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> <xs:restriction base="xs:string"> <xs:minLength value="1"/> <xs:maxLength value="16"/> </xs:restriction> </xs:simpleType> <xs:simpleType name="subscriptionId"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>For future use.</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> <xs:restriction base="xs:string"> <xs:minLength value="1"/> <xs:maxLength value="16"/> </xs:restriction> </xs:simpleType> <xs:simpleType name="amount4dp"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>Amount in 4DP presentation, i.e. 12,3456 EUR for 123456.</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> <xs:restriction base="xs:long"> <xs:totalDigits fixed="false" value="10"/> </xs:restriction> </xs:simpleType> <xs:simpleType name="currency"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>Currency in ISO4217-currency-code style.</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> <xs:restriction base="xs:string"> <xs:enumeration value="EUR"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>Euro curreny code</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:enumeration> </xs:restriction> </xs:simpleType> <xs:simpleType name="voucherCode"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>Voucher code to be redeemed.</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> <xs:restriction base="xs:string"> <xs:minLength value="1"/> <xs:maxLength value="16"/> </xs:restriction> </xs:simpleType> <xs:simpleType name="msisdn"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>Valid MSISDN. DRC preference a msisdn-shape of: 4917612304567</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> <xs:restriction base="xs:string"> <xs:pattern value="(\+49|0049|49|0)[1-9]\d{8,11}"/> <!--only digits, MSISDN like 0176/1234589 is not allowed--> </xs:restriction> </xs:simpleType> <xs:complexType name="balance"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>Data type for all kind of balances.</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> <xs:sequence> <xs:element name="amount" type="tns:amount4dp"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>Amount in in 4DP presentation, i.e. 12,3456 EUR for 123456.</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:element> <xs:element name="currency" type="tns:currency"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>The currency unit in ISO4217-currency-code style.</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:element> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> <xs:simpleType name="paymentUseCase"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>payment use case configuration</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> <xs:restriction base="xs:string"> <xs:minLength value="1"/> <xs:maxLength value="50"/> </xs:restriction> </xs:simpleType> <xs:simpleType name="tenantId"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>tenant id</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> <xs:restriction base="xs:int"> <xs:minInclusive value="1"/> <xs:maxInclusive value="9"/> </xs:restriction> </xs:simpleType> </xs:schema>

<xs:schema attributeFormDefault="unqualified" elementFormDefault="unqualified" targetNamespace="http://directrecharge.o2.com/ws/iso8583/v1/" xmlns:xs="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema" xmlns="http://directrecharge.o2.com/ws/iso8583/v1/"> <xs:simpleType name="terminalId"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>Identification number of the terminal in POS-System (BMP41) This field has only backwards compatibility relevance for the Iso8583 standard.</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> <xs:restriction base="xs:string"> <xs:length value="8"/> </xs:restriction> </xs:simpleType> <xs:simpleType name="terminalTimestamp"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>Timestamp from the terminal (BMP12/13). This field has only backwards compatibility relevance for the Iso8583 standard.</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> <xs:restriction base="xs:dateTime"/> </xs:simpleType> <xs:simpleType name="transactionId"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>All messages of the same business transaction have the same tracenumber (BMP11). For every business transaction this number must be incremented (sequential number).</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> <xs:restriction base="xs:string"> <xs:length value="6"/> </xs:restriction> </xs:simpleType> <xs:simpleType name="serverId"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>Identification number from the client server. In banking environments it could be the identification number from the computing center (BMP33).</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> <xs:restriction base="xs:string"> <xs:minLength value="1"/> <xs:maxLength value="6"/> </xs:restriction> </xs:simpleType> <xs:simpleType name="processingId"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>Six digits long processing code starting with 28 (predefined value).
Structure: 28 XX XX
XX XX = Reference number
For the OPAL Interface this field isnâ€™t mandatory but needed for DRC internal processing. This field has only backwards compatibility relevance for the Iso8583 standard.</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> <xs:restriction base="xs:string"> <xs:pattern value="\d{6,6}"/> </xs:restriction> </xs:simpleType> <xs:simpleType name="partnerId"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>The unique ID of the partner (predefined value). This field has only backwards compatibility relevance for the Iso8583 standard (BMP42).</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> <xs:restriction base="xs:string"> <xs:minLength value="15"/> <xs:maxLength value="15"/> </xs:restriction> </xs:simpleType> <xs:simpleType name="cardType"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>the cardType.</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> <xs:restriction base="xs:string"> <xs:length value="2"/> </xs:restriction> </xs:simpleType> </xs:schema>
